name: facepay-orchestrator
description: FacePay Orchestrator - Multi-Agent System for Facial Recognition Payments

scripts.status: echo 'Checking orchestrator status...' && node -e "console.log('FacePay Orchestrator Ready')"
scripts.create: node -e "const OrchestratorController = require('./agents/orchestrator_controller.js'); const controller = new OrchestratorController(); controller.initialize(); controller.createExampleTasks();"
scripts.launch: node -e "const OrchestratorController = require('./agents/orchestrator_controller.js'); const controller = new OrchestratorController(); controller.initialize(); console.log('\nAgent launch commands:'); Object.keys(controller.agentDefinitions || {}).forEach(agent => controller.launchAgent(agent));"
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning temporary files...' && rm -rf temp/* || true

author: Davicho
